title: Film Director
description: Seeking an experienced film director to lead a feature film project. Must have a proven track record in the industry.

title: Cinematographer
description: Looking for a skilled cinematographer to join a major production. Must have expertise with film cameras and lighting setups.

title: Sound Designer
description: Seeking a talented sound designer to create immersive audio experiences for films. Must be proficient in Pro Tools and other sound editing software.

title: Film Editor
description: Looking for an experienced film editor with expertise in post-production processes. Must be familiar with Adobe Premiere Pro and Final Cut Pro.

title: Production Assistant
description: Entry-level position for a production assistant. Responsibilities include assisting with day-to-day operations and production tasks.
